SELECT RCT.NAME_RCT AS 'RecipientName',RCT.CODE_RCT AS 'RecipientCode',SLV.NAME_SLV AS 'Status',RBL.REC_REMARKS_LOG AS 'Remark',RBL.REC_UPDATED_ON_LOG AS 'UpdatedOn' FROM RECEPIENT_BLOCK_LOGS_RBL RBL JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON RCT.CODE_RCT = RBL.REC_CODE_LOG JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT WHERE RBL.REC_CODE_LOG = #{code} ORDER BY RBL.REC_UPDATED_ON_LOG DESC

SELECT inv.ID_INV as 'inventoryId',itm.NAME_ITM as 'productName',itm.CODE_ITM as 'productCode',inv.PO_NO_INV as 'poNo',inv.PACK_SIZE_INV as 'basepack',inv.BATCH_NO_INV as 'batchNo' FROM INVENTORY_INV INV JOIN ITEM_MASTER_ITM ITM ON ITM.ID_ITM = INV.ID_ITM_INV WHERE INV.ID_INV in #{item}
UNION SELECT inv.ID_INV as 'inventoryId',smp.NAME_SMP as 'productName',smp.LMID_SMP as 'productCode',inv.PO_NO_INV as 'poNo',inv.PACK_SIZE_INV as 'basepack',inv.BATCH_NO_INV as 'batchNo' FROM INVENTORY_INV INV JOIN SAMPLE_MASTER_SMP SMP ON SMP.ID_SMP = INV.ID_ITM_INV WHERE INV.ID_INV in #{item}
